subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
Semantic compound of {{m|zh|尸}}+{{m|zh|至}}. ({{lang|zh|尸}}) does not represent the radical for death, but is a pictogram depicting a cloth draped. {{lang|zh|至}} means "dead end". Together the characters depict a tent-like structure.
